name: Pixelated Fire
description:
Just noticed that while i'm experimenting with the engine, I really like to play around with particles.

Change different parameters, etc.

So I decided to make this little sandbox so people can play with it too.

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Controls ( there are a lot of them )

123456 - Light obsticles

QWERTY - Fire size

UIOP - Particles lifetime

ASD - Start color

ZXC - End color

HJKL - Particles per second

VBNM - Spray cone size

F - Fullscreen ( ESC to exit )
